001// Copyright (c) FIRST and other WPILib contributors.
002// Open Source Software; you can modify and/or share it under the terms of

004
005package edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command;
006
007import edu.wpi.first.util.sendable.SendableBuilder;
008import java.util.Collections;
009import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
010import java.util.Map;
011
012/**
013 * A command composition that runs a set of commands in parallel, ending only when a specific
014 * command (the "deadline") ends, interrupting all other commands that are still running at that
015 * point.
016 *
017 * <p>The rules for command compositions apply: command instances that are passed to it cannot be
018 * added to any other composition or scheduled individually, and the composition requires all
019 * subsystems its components require.
020 *
021 * <p>This class is provided by the NewCommands VendorDep
022 */
023public class ParallelDeadlineGroup extends Command {
024  // maps commands in this composition to whether they are still running
025  // LinkedHashMap guarantees we iterate over commands in the order they were added (Note that
026  // changing the value associated with a command does NOT change the order)
027  private final Map<Command, Boolean> m_commands = new LinkedHashMap<>();
028  private boolean m_runWhenDisabled = true;
029  private boolean m_finished = true;
030  private Command m_deadline;
031  private InterruptionBehavior m_interruptBehavior = InterruptionBehavior.kCancelIncoming;
032
033  /**
034   * Creates a new ParallelDeadlineGroup. The given commands, including the deadline, will be
035   * executed simultaneously. The composition will finish when the deadline finishes, interrupting
036   * all other still-running commands. If the composition is interrupted, only the commands still
037   * running will be interrupted.
038   *
039   * @param deadline the command that determines when the composition ends
040   * @param otherCommands the other commands to be executed
041   * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the deadline command is also in the otherCommands argument
042   */
043  public ParallelDeadlineGroup(Command deadline, Command... otherCommands) {
044    setDeadline(deadline);
045    addCommands(otherCommands);
046  }
047
048  /**
049   * Sets the deadline to the given command. The deadline is added to the group if it is not already
050   * contained.
051   *
052   * @param deadline the command that determines when the group ends
053   * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the deadline command is already in the composition
054   */
055  public final void setDeadline(Command deadline) {
056    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.CompareObjectsWithEquals")
057    boolean isAlreadyDeadline = deadline == m_deadline;
058    if (isAlreadyDeadline) {
059      return;
060    }
061    if (m_commands.containsKey(deadline)) {
062      throw new IllegalArgumentException(
063          "The deadline command cannot also be in the other commands!");
064    }
065    addCommands(deadline);
066    m_deadline = deadline;
067  }
068
069  /**
070   * Adds the given commands to the group.
071   *
072   * @param commands Commands to add to the group.
073   */
074  public final void addCommands(Command... commands) {
075    if (!m_finished) {
076      throw new IllegalStateException(
077          "Commands cannot be added to a composition while it's running");
078    }
079
080    CommandScheduler.getInstance().registerComposedCommands(commands);
081
082    for (Command command : commands) {
083      if (!Collections.disjoint(command.getRequirements(), m_requirements)) {
084        throw new IllegalArgumentException(
085            "Multiple commands in a parallel group cannot require the same subsystems");
086      }
087      m_commands.put(command, false);
088      m_requirements.addAll(command.getRequirements());
089      m_runWhenDisabled &= command.runsWhenDisabled();
090      if (command.getInterruptionBehavior() == InterruptionBehavior.kCancelSelf) {
091        m_interruptBehavior = InterruptionBehavior.kCancelSelf;
092      }
093    }
094  }
095
096  @Override
097  public final void initialize() {
098    for (Map.Entry<Command, Boolean> commandRunning : m_commands.entrySet()) {
099      commandRunning.getKey().initialize();
100      commandRunning.setValue(true);
101    }
102    m_finished = false;
103  }
104
105  @Override
106  public final void execute() {
107    for (Map.Entry<Command, Boolean> commandRunning : m_commands.entrySet()) {
108      if (!commandRunning.getValue()) {
109        continue;
110      }
111      commandRunning.getKey().execute();
112      if (commandRunning.getKey().isFinished()) {
113        commandRunning.getKey().end(false);
114        commandRunning.setValue(false);
115        if (commandRunning.getKey().equals(m_deadline)) {
116          m_finished = true;
117        }
118      }
119    }
120  }
121
122  @Override
123  public final void end(boolean interrupted) {
124    for (Map.Entry<Command, Boolean> commandRunning : m_commands.entrySet()) {
125      if (commandRunning.getValue()) {
126        commandRunning.getKey().end(true);
127      }
128    }
129  }
130
131  @Override
132  public final boolean isFinished() {
133    return m_finished;
134  }
135
136  @Override
137  public boolean runsWhenDisabled() {
138    return m_runWhenDisabled;
139  }
140
141  @Override
142  public InterruptionBehavior getInterruptionBehavior() {
143    return m_interruptBehavior;
144  }
145
146  @Override
147  public void initSendable(SendableBuilder builder) {
148    super.initSendable(builder);
149
150    builder.addStringProperty("deadline", m_deadline::getName, null);
151  }
152}
